#summary Erasedata plug-in description

== Introduction ==

The plug-in adds an item "Delete data" to the context menu the downloading item, which allows to remove not only a .torrent file, but also its data.

[http://rutorrent.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/erasedata.jpg]

== Known lacks ==

The plug-in will not delete the directories created as a result of downloading. Files are the only subject to remove.
